entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InvalidCastException from DefiniteAssignmentPass during extract method analysis #57428
  • Code cleanup doesn't apply "this." qualifier to object initializer #57424
  • Failure in CSharpCodeActions.GFUFuzzyMatchAfterRenameTrackingAndAfterGenerateType #57423
  • Failure in LspMiscellaneousFilesWorkspaceTests.TestLooseFile_MovedToRegisteredWorkspace #57422
  • Official builds keep failing in an opaque manner #57420
  • [SourceLink] Use PEReader to try to read pdbs #57417
  • csharp_indent_preprocessor_region=usual_indent vs. preprocessor-disabled code #57416
  • Pull Members up on Interfaces does not move documentation to interfaces #57415
  • SyntaxToken.GetLocation().GetLineSpan() crashes with an ArgumentOutOfRangeException when visiting XmlTextLiteralNewLineToken #57413
    17.1
  • Roslyn fails to detect nullability problems in C# 10 interpolated string handlers #57412

Closed

  • Assert fails in SourceGeneratedFileItemSource.cs line 120 #57287
    17.1
  • Make sure we have test coverage for all bound nodes that directly or indirectly store Conversion #53870
    17.1
  • Snippets Revamp #55557
    17.1
  • Request for improvement of TextSpan.ToString() documentation. #57299
    17.1
  • VS freezes when using Roslyn experimental instance containing multiple TFMs #57289
    17.1
  • Rationalize VB and C# anonymous delegate types. #55292
    17.1
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #55896
    17.1
  • Analyzers not being recognized in Dev17 Preview 6 #57293
    17.0
  • SymbolDisplayFormat.FullyQualifiedFormat is probably missing memberOptions #50259
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix C# language name in spec #57427
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust expected behavior for tests targeting late-bound access to init-only properties. #57426
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge `main` branch into `list-patterns` branch #57425
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #57421
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57419
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do not normalize leading whitespace in code comments #57414
    Area-IDE
  • Classify method group assignments as methods #57410
    Area-IDE
  • Fix IDE remote analyzer loader on .Net Core #57407
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add PiiValue, use it for EnC project id telemetry #57406
    Area-Interactive

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57418
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix exception being thrown if the list of files didn't change #57340
    Area-IDE, Next
  • handle null project paths in solution #57234
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.1 #57403
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57388
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57372
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1.P1
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update TextSpan.cs #57300
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57408
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix the assembly name used in generator identity #57341
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #57186
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge `main` branch into `list-patterns` branch #57404
    Area-Compilers, Needs UX Triage
  • Update documentation to explain FullyQualifiedFormat behavior #57397
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • List patterns: counterexample for non-exhaustive switch expressions #55327
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.1
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57411
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57409
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Revert "Merge pull request #53768 from jasonmalinowski/allow-async-batch-application" #57405
    Area-IDE
  • IDECoreBenchmarks Changes #57112
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57378
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57389
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57432
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57431
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57430
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57429
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [LSP] Add semantic tokens benchmarks + improve edit algorithm #57231
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, LSP
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Move search under tabs #57188
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Compute val escape for list patterns #57336
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • List patterns: IOperation #56008
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Interpolated string handler IOperation support #56276
    Area-Analyzers
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix param-nullchecking build/test failures #57375
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Switch to project version caching instead of sln crawler events pull diagnostics #57380
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to calling into IAsyncLightBulbSession directly to avoid polling. #57316
    Area-IDE
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
